name: @nimblebraininc/folk
description: Folk CRM server for managing people, companies, notes, and reminders

api_key.title: Folk API Key
api_key.description: Your Folk API key from workspace settings (Settings > API)

tools.name: find_person
tools.description: Find people by name in the CRM

tools.name: find_company
tools.description: Find companies by name in the CRM

tools.name: get_person_details
tools.description: Get full details for a person by their ID

tools.name: get_company_details
tools.description: Get full details for a company by its ID

tools.name: browse_people
tools.description: Browse all people in the CRM with pagination

tools.name: browse_companies
tools.description: Browse all companies in the CRM with pagination

tools.name: list_groups
tools.description: List all groups in the Folk workspace

tools.name: find_people_in_group
tools.description: Find people in a specific group with optional status and custom field filters

tools.name: find_companies_in_group
tools.description: Find companies in a specific group with optional status and custom field filters

tools.name: add_person
tools.description: Add a new person to the CRM

tools.name: add_company
tools.description: Add a new company to the CRM

tools.name: update_person
tools.description: Update fields on an existing person

tools.name: update_company
tools.description: Update fields on an existing company

tools.name: delete_person
tools.description: Delete a person from the CRM

tools.name: delete_company
tools.description: Delete a company from the CRM

tools.name: add_note
tools.description: Add a note to a person

tools.name: get_notes
tools.description: Get notes for a person

tools.name: set_reminder
tools.description: Set a reminder for a person

tools.name: log_interaction
tools.description: Log an interaction with a person

tools.name: whoami
tools.description: Get information about the current authenticated user
